Fortnite.init_failed: Could not initialize Epic Games Launcher.
Fortnite.login_failed: Login failed. That can happen in the following cases: The servers are offline, your account is banned, the account data is wrong or you've tried sign in too often within a short time.

Config.invalid_format: Your config.json is invalid. Please reconfigure it by adding {{arg}}. Just open a Terminal, run the script and add {{arg}}.
